greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Product_{ p | n } (1 + Legendre(-3,p) ).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
maple: with(numtheory); L := proc(n,N) local i,t1,t2; t1 := ifactors(n)[2]; t2 := mul((1+legendre(N,t1[i][1])),i=1..nops(t1)); end; [seq(L(n,-3),n=1..120)];
program: A091393(n) = vecproduct(apply(p -> (1 + kronecker(-3,p)), factorint(n)[, 1])); \\ _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 18 2017
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Mar 02 2004
